name: Chrono Tower
instruction: Continue exploring and clear Main Story stages.

name: Strong Stamina
instruction: Stamina is the driving force that sustains the Witch. Exploring Main Story costs Stamina.

name: Strong Stamina
instruction: Stamina is the driving force that sustains the Witch. Exploring Main Story costs Stamina.

name: Enhance Dolls
instruction: You can increase the enhancement level of Dolls by consuming Mana.

name: Extend Best Wishes
description: Send a gift to a Doll 1 time
instruction: Givie nice gifts to your Dolls to increase the Bond level.

name: Enhance Equipment
instruction: You can enhance equipment with certain materials.

name: Dispatch for Exploration
description: Explore the Mirror of the Otherworld 1 time
instruction: You can dispatch Dolls to explore the Mirror of the Otherworld in Witch Courtyard. They will bring back plentiful materials.

name: Break Time
description: Settle Dolls in the Cottage 1 time
instruction: Cottage is a main building in Witch Courtyard. Dolls restore Energy there.

name: Friendship Exchange
description: Purchase in Friendship Point Shop 1 time
instruction: Friend assistance brings you Friendship Points that can be traded for items in the shop.

name: Friend Assist
description: Clear a stage with Assisting Doll 1 time

name: Chronospace Duel
instruction: Fight against other witches in Chronospace Breach.
